scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, possibly a prophet or saint, kneels with his left leg bent and his right leg extended. He wears a red robe with gold trim over a yellow tunic. His hands are clasped together, holding a white object, possibly a scroll or a book. The background depicts a stylized landscape with a blue sky, green ground, and hints of architectural structures on the left and right, suggesting an outdoor setting. The figure has a halo, indicating his saintly status.
